definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Photo Gallery: Sydney Bondi Beach Sunbathing is a popular way to relax in Sydney.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的日光浴是一個受歡迎的途徑有利於鬆弛。

sentences.english: Tanning beds can also produce high levels of U-V radiation.
sentences.chinese: 日光浴也會產生高強度的紫外線。

sentences.english: Hand-woven straw hats take a sunbath under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 手工編織的草帽，在屋前排好隊，進行日光浴。

sentences.english: He wanted to sunbathe rather than swim.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願曬日光浴也不去游泳。

sentences.english: You can drink some juice and you can sunbathe .
sentences.chinese: 你可以喝點飲料，同時你可以進行日光浴。

sentences.english: Amy basks in the sun no matter how hot it is.
sentences.chinese: 不管多炎熱，愛咪享受日光浴。

sentences.english: I will treat myself to a sunbath.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好享受一下日光浴。

sentences.english: You can also get a good sun-tan there.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以充分的享受哪裏的日光浴。

sentences.english: The second floor has a home theater and a sunbathing deck above the master bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 二樓有一個家庭影院，在主臥上方有供日光浴的露臺。

sentences.english: He wanted to sunbathe rather than to swim.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願曬日光浴，也不願去游泳。

sentences.english: Snorkelling at the coral reefs or sunbath on the private beach.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在珊瑚礁潛水或者在私人海灘日光浴。

sentences.english: Summer, before sunbathe, appear place should oil of daub embellish skin or vanishing cream.
sentences.chinese: 夏天，在日光浴前，外露部位應塗抹潤膚油或雪花膏。

sentences.english: How many of you would like to lie on the beach and get tan?
sentences.chinese: 你們當中有多少人希望躺在沙灘上享受日光浴呢？

sentences.english: Sometimes a sloth sunbathes in the morning to warm up.
sentences.chinese: 有時，樹獺會在早上來個日光浴以使自己變暖和。

sentences.english: Access to exclusive private courtyard area with pool, hot tub and sundeck.
sentences.chinese: 私家庭院面積的游泳池，溫泉浴缸和日光浴。

sentences.english: A woman takes in some rays on the sands of Haeundae beach in Busan, South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 一名女子在釜山海雲臺沙灘曬日光浴，韓國。

definition: to be in the sun (getting warm or sunbathing etc)/to put sth in the sun (e.g. to dry it)
to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
to take a bath/to bathe/to immerse
to soak in a spa or hot spring
